artist: Painter: After Adriaen van der Werff; Engraver: Pieter van Gunst
description: portrait bust; turned right looking out at viewer; long dark beard and short curly dark hair; wearing armour and chain with the insignia of the Order of the Golden Fleece; in an oval on a wolf's pelt with skulls below
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: ficquet / ADRIEN / VANDER WERF / ELEVE / D\'EGLON VANDER NEER  |  on sheet in pencil: 2-596
title: Ferdinand de Toledo, Duc d'Alba
